DOC.brief_summary: To assess the feasibility of CT-derived computed fractional flow reserve (FFRCT), wall shear stress and total plaque force on coronary atherosclerotic plaque and to collect the preliminary data to apply those parameters for the prediction of clinical outcomes in patients with coronary artery stenosis.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of FFR, WSS, and TPF Using CCTA
DOC.criteria: Consecutive patients with available CCTA within 3 months of invasive angiography and invasive imaging methods (IVUS or OCT) Poor CT images (unable to reconstruct 3 dimensional coronary artery model)
